meanings.definition: A person or company that sells goods or services purchased from a manufacturer or wholesaler to the public.
meanings.sent1: The reseller at the store offered a variety of products to customers.
meanings.sent2: The online reseller quickly sold out of the popular items.
meanings.sent3: The reseller joked that they were the 'middleman of happiness' with their products.
meanings.sent4: She was a reseller of dreams, making people's wishes come true with each sale.
meanings.sent5: The reseller's shop was like a treasure trove, full of hidden gems waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: To sell (goods) to customers for a profit.
meanings.sent1: He decided to resell the vintage items he had collected over the years.
meanings.sent2: The company resells electronics at competitive prices.
meanings.sent3: She resold the concert tickets at a higher price to make a profit.
meanings.sent4: The idea of reselling old books sparked a new business venture for him.
meanings.sent5: They resell handmade crafts from local artisans to support the community.
